analyzed: sngon du ston ba cho gas stong ba nyid sgom ba rjes su sna tshogs padma steng du zla ba la hr:yongs su gyur ba las padma gar gyi dbang phyug ces byed ba

original: zhal gcig pa /

original: 'od dpag tu med pa'i cod pan can /

original: g-yon pa'i phyag na padma dmar po bsnams pa /

analyzed: zhes byed ba sngags rjod ba byed

original: dkar mo padma dmar po bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: dkar mo padma dmar po snom ba

analyzed: lho phyogs kyi dab ma la sgrol ma autpa la ljang gu snom ba

original: nub phyogs kyi 'dab ma la dbang phyug ma ser mo autpa la sngon po bsnams pa'o //

original: byang gi 'dab ma la khro gnyer can dkar mo padma ser po bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: byang gi dab ma la khro gnyer can dkar mo padma ser po snom ba

analyzed: zhal gcig ba nye ba zhi ba
